Title: Relates to including rape in the third degree, rape in the second degree and rape in the first degree as family offenses
Summary: Includes rape in the third degree, rape in the second degree and rape in the first degree as family offenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง530.11, CP L; amd ยง812, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to including rape in the third degree, rape in the second degree and rape in the first degree as family offenses
